snippet: Daniel Hernández-Salazar’s life has been shaped by his quest — as an artist and Guatemalan — to see justice for the crimes committed during that country’s civil war. Last week, his vigil ended.
abstract: Daniel Hernández-Salazar’s life has been shaped by his quest — as an artist and Guatemalan — to see justice for the crimes committed during that country’s civil war. Last week, his vigil ended.

headline.main: A Quest for Justice in Guatemala
